title: tomcc : 0.13.0纪录片已经完工

txt_content:

2015/12/9 2:30(BeiJing 时间)

Oh hey, the new Minecraft Pocket Edition (and Windows10) 
trailer is out :D https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-fMtNOS_gU

哦嘿，新的Minecraft 便携版[sup](PE)[/sup](还有 Windows10 版)的纪录片已经发布啦！:D
